kvinna.title: Group exhibition - Mars 2026
kvinna.desc: Together with the gallerist Erika Wilhelmsson and a bunch of other atrists we arrange a fabolous celebration to womanhood.

clarion.title: Solo exhibition - June-September 2024
clarion.desc: The subject of the exhibition might spark connotations to shallowness, beauty and surface. Looking closer, you might discover a shift, a desire or what do YOU see? The exhibition will greet hotel visitors throughout the summer. Do go there and explore my art, enjoy the amazing restaurant NÃ“R and the wonderful Elemnts spa.

juste.title: Solo exhibition - May 2025
juste.desc: Welcome to an exhibition where you can explore some of my more experimental, abstract and playful work. We meet to celebrate joy, freedom and playfullness. Come as you are, mingle and have fun!

about.title: About the artist
about.intro1: Kajsa Unge (b. 1982) grew up on the island of Gotland and is now based in Stockholm, Sweden. Her artistic practice explores the strength within vulnerability â€“ where surfaces rarely tell the whole story.
about.quote: 'The creative process is intuitive and organically shaped, resulting in works that carry a raw and poetic presence.'
about.intro2: Alongside her artistic work, she is active as a digital designer and web developer, focusing on creative and interactive solutions.
